recipe.title: Barbados Breeze
ingredients: Orange slice and maraschino cherry for garnish
instructions: Mix rum, orange curaçao, lime juice and sugar in tall glass; stir to dissolve sugar. Mix in club soda. Fill with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry and serve.
